content: these fingerless mitts are a free pattern direct pattern link 1 **skill level ** easy **size ** s/m m/l 7 8 17 8 20 3 cm palm circumference **finished measurements ** 6 7 15 2 17 8 cm palm circumference 8½ 9 21 6 22 9 cm length design has 1 2 5 cm of negative ease **materials ** cascade yarns® heritage prints 75% superwash merino wool/ 25% nylon 100g 3 5 oz / 437 yds 399 6 m 1 skein us 2 2 75 mm double pointed knitting needles or size to obtain gauge set of 4 3 stitch markers stitch holder yarn needle **gauge ** 32 sts x 42 rnds = 4 10 cm blocked in the round in stockinette stitch 44 sts x 40 rnds = 4 10 cm blocked in the round in 2x2 rib 1 https //www cascadeyarns com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/fw226_heritageprints_bristleconefingerlessmitts pdf
